content:
There is no message preview, but many folk appear to think the message pane(f8) is a preview. It is just one of the three message reader interfaces Thunderbird offers along with the tab and a new window.

Try pressing F8 and see if that is what you mean.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: yes that was the issue. I had another problem the other day and I hit several of the function keys to clear that. evidently the f8 key was one. Pressing it did fix the issue. Thank you.
creator: Rosaliy-Lynne

content: right click the folder, select properties and then the repair button. Did the whole email disappear? or the content of the email appear?
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
After you paste your old profile into the new location, you must tell Thunderbird to use that profile.

Help menu > Troubleshooting info > about:profiles > identify the desired profile > set as default profile > maybe re-start Thunderbird
creator: mozilla98

content: You cannot. I am unaware of any email client that shows a message without showing it.
creator: davidsk
